hook.text: The first number on the table shapes every number that follows. Anchoring is the most powerful opening move.

buildup.text: Psychological anchoring means the first number mentioned becomes the reference point for all subsequent offers.

discovery.text: Even random numbers create anchoring effects. Judges given higher random numbers gave longer sentences.

twist.text: Most people avoid making the first offer. But research shows first movers get better deals on average.

climax.text: Make an aggressive but justifiable first offer. The anchor you set defines the negotiation's gravity.

punchline.text: Set the anchor or be anchored. There's no third option.

quiz.question: Why should you consider making the first offer?
options: The first number sets the anchor that shapes all subsequent offers
The first offer is always accepted
